M Fikri Sodri

A personal blog by M. Fikri Sodri, a student at Politeknik Negeri Lhokseumawe. He is from Aceh Tamiang and was born on January 27, 2006. He is currently studying in the Department of Information and Computer Technology, majoring in Informatics Engineering. This blog is built using Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages. The content is primarily in Indonesian, but some posts may be in English.
